page.title: 19BIOGRAPHY (CONT.)
page.content: {Continued: {Has the village changed during your {life? When I was a child there were fewer people,no housing estates and field and orchards covered the land. There weren't any motor cars so there were no proper roads. There was no need to lock your door when you went out as you do today. {Did the War affect life in Haslington? Not really but some people were conscripted and of course some of them lost thir lives. {Do you prefer life in the past? I think that life was better in the past.When I was younger the world seemed to be a better place with less violence and the life was much slower and easier.
